Body:
t = Template(
    """
            <%def name="a()">
                <%def name="d()">
                    not this d
                </%def>
                this is a ${b()}
                <%def name="b()">
                    <%def name="d()">
                        not this d either
                    </%def>
                    this is b
                    <%call expr="c()">
                        <%def name="d()">
                            this is d
                        </%def>
                        this is the body in b's call
                    </%call>
                </%def>
                <%def name="c()">
                    this is c: ${caller.body()}
                    the embedded "d" is: ${caller.d()}
                </%def>
            </%def>
        ${a()}
"""
    )
assert result_lines(t.render()) == ['this is a', 'this is b', 'this is c:',
    "this is the body in b's call", 'the embedded "d" is:', 'this is d']
